content: I’m currently a CS MS student at USC in the Cognitive Learning for Vision and Robotics Lab under Dr. Joseph Lim . I obtained my BS in CS at Portland State University while working in the Biologically-Inspired Computing Lab under Dr. Dan Hammerstrom researching brain-inspired vision algorithms. My research interests include hierarchical reinforcment learning, unsupervised reinforcment learning, and few-shot learning.
